description: A young man gains superpowers and becomes the web-slinging superhero, Spider-Man.
Batman faces off against the Joker in a high-stakes battle for Gotham.
A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets must perform one last job.
A computer hacker discovers a dystopian reality controlled by machines.
A team of astronauts travels through a wormhole to save humanity.
A romance unfolds aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
Humans on an alien planet face moral dilemmas and conflicts with indigenous creatures.
The story of the powerful Corleone crime family and their rise to power.
Interconnected stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.
The extraordinary life story of a man with a low IQ who influences major historical events.
A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor.
Dinosaurs are brought back to life and wreak havoc on a theme park.
A man wrongfully imprisoned finds hope and redemption in a harsh prison.
Superheroes assemble to save the world from an alien invasion.
A billionaire inventor builds a high-tech suit to fight crime.
A young lion prince must reclaim his kingdom from his treacherous uncle.
A teenager travels back in time and must ensure his parents fall in love.
A young farm boy joins a rebellion against a tyrannical empire.
An archaeologist embarks on a quest to find a biblical artifact.
Toys come to life when their owner is not around and go on an adventure.
A cop goes undercover in the world of street racing to solve a series of heists.
